org.ServerGui.Controller

Class LobbySceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ServerGui.Controller.AbstractSceneController
      • org.ServerGui.Controller.LobbySceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LobbySceneController
extends AbstractSceneController

    Controller for scene Lobby. Used to display games and tournaments.
